channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- School Management System – WPSchoolPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- School Management System – WPSchoolPress

item.title: CVE-2021-24664|2024-08-03T19:42:15.967Z -- unknown -- school%20management%20system%20%E2%80%93%20wpschoolpress
item.description: The School Management System – WPSchoolPress WordPress plugin before 2.1.17 sanitise some fields using sanitize_text_field() but does not escape them before outputting in attributes, resulting in Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues.

item.title: CVE-2021-24575|2024-08-03T19:35:20.174Z -- unknown -- school%20management%20system%20%E2%80%93%20wpschoolpress
item.description: The School Management System – WPSchoolPress WordPress plugin before 2.1.10 does not properly sanitize or use prepared statements before using POST variable in SQL queries, leading to SQL injection in multiple actions available to various authenticated users, from simple subscribers/students to teachers and above.
